dialogue.text: Vivian WongHello, this is CentralHong Kong Police ForceBase. Your son-in-law was arrested for prostitution yesterday. Pay 30,000 yuan bail now.
I know this is a scam. You have no proof, and my son-in-law isn't involved. Stop calling.
Please, the matter is serious. If you don't pay, more will find out.
Hello, this is manual customer service of HKBU. With the exam near, do your classmates need the exam questions? Fill the links we sent to finish booking.
Oh, I didn't know about this. Where can I find the links to complete the booking?
The links are sent to your email. Just follow the steps and complete payment to get access to the questions.
I'll take the exam next week. Nervous already?
Yes, a bit stressed. What about you?
I have a special prep guide. Want me to send it? It guarantees a pass.
